DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional , retrospective , cross sectional chart review study evaluate management rheumatoid arthritis patient biologic monotherapy . Data eligible patient collect patient 's last visit prior rheumatoid arthritis treatment recent visit biological monotherapy .
